title: Europeanizing Flood Forecasting and the Geographies of Risk & Science in the EU
abstractText: Focused on the European Flood Alert System (EFAS) being developed at the Joint Research Centre (JRC) of the European Union (EU), this project uses the case of flooding to explore the more general process by which the management of environmental and health risks is being 'Europeanised'. It will document the contested understandings of uncertainty and modelling involved in producing, disseminating and using the EFAS ensemble flood forecasts and make recommendations about improving their specific role in flood risk assessment and management in Europe.
